Controller

Class ChesstoryConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.ChesstoryConstants

  • public class ChesstoryConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all the constants we use ! (Themes, font_size, texts, etc)
    Author:
    Acevedo Roman and Guillemot Baptiste.
